question: A painter works for 2 weeks every month and for 7 days every week. If he gets paid €185 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The painter works for 7 days every week and works for 2 weeks every month so he works for 7 days/week * 2 weeks/month = <<7*2=14>>14 days/month
If he earns €185 every day he then earns €185/day * 14 days/month = €<<185*14=2590>>2590/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns €2590/month * 12 months/year = €<<2590*12=31,080>>31,080
#### 31,080
